//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   sampler2D s0;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name         Reg   Size
//   ------------ ----- ----
//   s0           s0       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c0, 0.5, -0.5, 2, 1
    dcl_texcoord v0.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    texld r0, v0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, c0.y
    add r0.y, -r0.w, c0.x
    mul r0.xzw, r0.x, c0.zyxx
    mul r1.xyz, r0.y, c0.xxzw
    cmp oC0.xyz, r0.y, r1, r0.xzww
    mov oC0.w, c0.w

// approximately 7 instruction slots used (1 texture, 6 arithmetic)
